website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality coconut oil, but not a good choice for frequent users who need a larger amount than this jar contains.
pros: Pure coconut oil that is made with organic coconuts
Not refined, and made using the cold-pressed process
cons: The jar only contains 11 ounces, though the price is not out of line for the amount of product

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product. It's a big jar
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. It's a big jar, btw. I put the coconut oil (it's not oily, it's thick and white - extra virgin so it's right from the coconut) on after I bathe, and it's not something you have to wash off, or blot - it is absorbed by my skin. My skin looks amazing after one week of use. I am using it on entire body and face/neck. I used it on my hair as a hair repair treatment (lightly), washing it out afterward, and it left my hair shiny and healthy. Bonus - tastes delicious. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hall

customer_reviews.title: I use this everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I by several of these for my house, it's great in the kitchen, my bathroom, and bedroom. It's good for your face and as nighttime cream and your body when you get out of the shower. It also works on sunburns, I put a small jar in the freezer for the kids. I also give my dogs a teaspoon everyday for there joints and skin. It makes their coats soft and smooth. It also makes a great ointment for burns and cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Pasilie

customer_reviews.title: 'Works Just As Expected'
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on time. I purchased it mostly tor my skin and hair. Occasionally, I use it for cooking purposes and it gives the food a different but pleasing taste.The oil gives my face and skin a smooth feeling and is helping to grow my hair back slowly. (I suffer from 'allopecia)." Hopefully I can give an update after 3 months. P.S. Make sure to keep it in a cool place. (Just as the label states)
customer_reviews.author: DONNA SAMMS

customer_reviews.title: Great as a hair mask!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a mask for my hair, rather than to use with food preparation. As a hair treatment, I can honestly say that it was superior to the other coconut oil and coconut based product I bought. After one treatment, my hair was much softer. I now use it twice a week and I am seeing less breakage, more shine (without a greasy look or feel) and less of that brittle look and feel that comes with having severely damaged hair. I won't say it "repairs" hair, because nothing can do that. I will say that this oil, when used as a hair mask, does minimize the look and feel of "fried" hair.
customer_reviews.author: Booktarts-and-sweethearts

customer_reviews.title: So many uses. I love it
customer_reviews.text: My heavens you can use coconut oil for almost everything. I have some in a small jar in the bathroom to take off my make up. It is especially good for taking off waterproof mascara. I just love the smell and it moisturizes as well as cleans my face. I use it in my hair on my skin and I love to saute my vegetables such as asparagus and torn kale leaves. I take a teaspoon in my coffee it is so healthy for you. wonderful product for so many uses. Love that this brand is organic.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSIVE!
customer_reviews.text: One word "WOW"! I was expecting an over-poweringly coconut fragrance that would chase my husband away from me, but it was nice & mild. My main plan initially was to use your product for my skin & hair. I was worried that it would be extremely oily-- WRONG! It absorbs immediately into my skin & hair leaving a silky smooth surface. My hands get so dry as fall & winter settles in, and Anjou's extremely absorbent nature provides the softness without greasy residue left on my hands. I am very impressed! Next stop is using it in cooking since it's passed all other tests with flying colors...
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: I've finally found relief.
customer_reviews.text: I've suffered from severe eczema all my life. Have had countless doctor/allergist visits, creams, drops, steroids, supplements etc and nothing worked. Most wouldn't even ease the symptoms let alone stop them and they side effects just made things worse. Fortunately, I grew out of the full body eczema, but unfortunately the eczema around my eyes never stopped. It is a terrible feeling. I ended up getting this product the day after my eyelids started scaling. Not only did it stop the scaling from getting worse, it stopped all the other terrible symptoms from even starting. Instead of having to suffer for 3-4 months, this ended it in 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: First And Last Time Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Questioned the authenticity of this so called extra virgin coconut oil since purchase on Jan 10, 2020. Barely an aroma, never gets completely solid unless in refrigerator and I am buying the previous brand after posting this review. Did some research and was enlightened. The words "extra virgin" is meaningless when it comes to coconut oil. I use it on my dog's coat. He likes it but not better than previous one I am about to buy. Bye
customer_reviews.author: Same Day TYVM

customer_reviews.title: Works great for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: It works wonders for dogs with skin issues. I started giving my 50 lb dog 1 tablespoon with her food daily and 2 to 3 weeks later her dry, flaky skin improved 95% of the way. I use it everyday on her food and her coat is shiny and all else has been dramatically reduced!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna James

customer_reviews.title: Really great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Fresh, high quality, all-natural coconut oil! The 32oz size is a great value especially if you use coconut oil on a daily basis. This brand of oil came in a sealed plastic container, there was no spillage or leaking and it is wonderfully fragrant which tells me it's fresh. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a coconut oil ADDICT; accordingly, I have tried dozens of different brands. Anjou is coconut oil in its purest form and has made my skin incredibly smooth, hydrated, and supple. I have also used it to make oatmeal chocolate chip cookies and they turned out great. This brand is very credible and I invite everyone to appreciate the powers of coconut oil!!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a facial moisturizer. I started using this as a substitute for harsh facial cleansers on the market. I have been using it for 2.5 months. It didn't get rid of the acne completely but my skin is smoother and clearer.
customer_reviews.author: apnd808

customer_reviews.title: as good as Dr. Bronners
customer_reviews.text: I think this is better than Dr Bronners as it is just as good quality and actually is better for cooking as it is not as strong coconut flavor/aroma. Works better for those recipes that you do not want that flavor (like saute's and frying). Also the price is better (not a real believer in the 'fair trade' stuff as it screws with the market price which does not help the folks not fortunate enough to afford to buy it. Businesses should make it on their own laurels). When you use for your skin you can still go out and not smell like you are covered in Hawaiian Tropic.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: STOP! Before you BUY! READ and see picture!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! Received in mid July 2018 and it’s expiration is Aug 2018! How can someone use 32 oz of coconut oil in 2 weeks! What a waste! Not to mention I can’t even use it for the 2 weeks left in its life since it’s already gone bad! Look how yellow it is compared to the Peachy Keen brand I bought much earlier in the year! Quality Oil is supposed to be clear! Not yellow!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely, very moisturizing 😍
customer_reviews.text: I purchased virgin coconut oil for hair & skin benefits I’am a black woman & growing up with a Caribbean background we are always told how beneficial coconut oil is. I’ve only used it twice so it’s still too early to state anything as of yet . It smells really good kind of sweet I heard virgin coconut oil shouldn’t have a scent but honestly I prefer it to have one . It is very moisturizing, my hair felt smooth next day as I left it in overnight & wrapped it . Very anxious to see how my hair & skin will glow within the next few months . Will be posting an update.
customer_reviews.author: Ri

customer_reviews.title: Quality not up to par
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product two stars because the coconut oil did not compare to the first jar I ordered in December 2016. The coconut oil in the latest order tasted a bit rancid, not like coconut, and the texture was grainy. I contacted Amazon and they refunded my money. I will say that the first jar I purchased was fantastic. The coconut oil was smooth with a light coconut flavor, and it was delicious. I have just reordered thinking that I must have received a dud. Hopefully, the next jar will contain the same sensational product that the first did and I will be able to rate it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: LinRabin

customer_reviews.title: From sun up to sun down!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product many times during my day. I used it on my great granddaughter's head to clear up cradle cap. I use it on my feet every night before I go to bed. I use it on my hands before and after I wash up. I have even encouraged my husband to use it on his feet. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Truly an Excellent Coconut Oil!
customer_reviews.text: Best organic coconut oil I have ever used and I've tried them all. I use this daily in my coffee and also in my dog treat recipes! My Girl's have beautiful shiny coats as a result! Love the taste of this and it melts very nicely. Some CO's i've tried seem to take longer to melt and stay very oily in my coffee and then solidify as my coffee cools, this brand does not do that. As my coffee cools I have NO chunks of Coconut Oil floating around. Kirkland (Costco) brand of "Organic Coconut Oil" is the worst--IMHO. This brand mixes and blends well in hot coffee and has a great flavor that is not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: SpirituMusica

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coconut oil. I know many do not like the coconut aroma but I love it. I use this coconut oil as a beauty product. I mix it in with my moisturizer for dry areas on my skin i.e. elbows, knees, and feet. Absolutely perfect for wiping off hard to budge makeup. Overall this product arrived on time and in great packaging conditions with no leaks. The seal on the coconut oil was so secure I even cut myself trying to peel it off. Which is great because it makes it hard for any kind of product tampering.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff but air pocket
customer_reviews.text: I had been using coconut oil from another well established company for years and wanted to try this brand. This, to me, is smoother on skin. Interesting that the texture varies from one brand to another while they are all "virgin coconut oil". Another thing that I noticed is that this stays softer at a same room temperature. One complain - as I poked the solid with my finger, a large void/ air pocket appeared. I would say it is about 20~30% of the volume of the container. I am not going to contact the manufacturer about it but it makes me think about my second purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: High-quality !
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! I have been using hand made coconut oil for my face for one and a half years and coconut oil is better than any cosmetic and so cheap ! ( some people might be allergic with it) . I bought this coconut oil because of its review and I totally fall in love with it after the first use ! The quality is really good ! Feelings on the face and the smell is also very good ! I’ve been using for several days and probably it is even better than my homemade one.
customer_reviews.author: Quasimoda

customer_reviews.title: I love my coconut oils
customer_reviews.text: This one is another great one. It’s excellent to cook with, for pulling, definitely whitening for teeth. Coconut oil is superb for the mouth, it kills germs, helps with bad breath, whitens teeth with continued use. You can also take some every day for good health, especially stomach health. I use the solid type mostly for cooking pulling, sometimes taking. In summer I use it for everything. It’s hard to use it for hair in winter, so I use the liquid form. I keep both on hand, coconut oil is the best. I get the type that’s consumable. I also give it to my dog every day. It’s great for his tummy, fur, overall health.
customer_reviews.author: arlc

customer_reviews.title: Larger size same price.
customer_reviews.text: Big bottle of coconut oil. Got it on prime day Twice as big as the bottle I normally would get but about the same price. Plastic bottle would be easier to take around and stuff. I used it as hand cream and foot massage cream. Very moisturizing and not as oily cuz it got absorbed very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Great Coconut Oil, container could be better, but not unhappy.
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this five stars but honestly the price and amount is a bit of an in-equilibrium, and the container for some reason didn't seal very well after opening so it constantly had to be cleaned with soapy water to get rid of the oil on it. The solution was to clean out a gelato container and put it in that instead. Other than that, the quality of the Organic Coconut Oil was above par and we are still enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: koogz

customer_reviews.title: Glad to find it!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this after Viva Labs changed to Viva Naturals, tried couple of others including Vitacost and Sky Organics (this one was the worst I think), but those weren't the best quality. Anjou, on the other hand is pretty close to Viva Labs one, very light but nice taste and good texture! Recommended
customer_reviews.author: JSonic

customer_reviews.title: So glad I gave this a try
customer_reviews.text: This was my first venture into this kind of product. I don't have much comparison on brands but I really love this stuff. I use it mostly for hair and skin. It is very oily after you apply it and will leave almost impossible to remove stains on items but that's to be expected. Keeping it at a good temperature also important because of it gets too warm and melts it can make quite a mess. Even after a lot of use I have more than half of the product so left so I'm quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Totty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Smell
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many, many coconut oils but this has been the best by far. The smell is so natural and pleasant. You can smell the coconut, but it doesn't smell fake or rancid, just like fresh coconut. I use it as a deep conditioner for my hair, and sometimes massage my scalp with it for dandruff. It really helps with that, and my hair is so shiny afterwards. I also use this for my skin and to remove makeup, works amazing for both. I even put this stuff on my dog when he got some kind of itchy rash...1 week later it was gone. So many uses, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rosi C.

customer_reviews.title: Leaked during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the first time thru Amazon, with a few other items. As it’s July, the oil id liquid not solid; and apparently not well sealed. It leaked all over the other items in the box; and on the shipping box as well. The item is non-returnable. I won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Elli3307

customer_reviews.title: Great product - exceptional for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I'm constantly on the hunt for a good quality coconut oil that doesn't break the bank. It doesn't often work out. I use coconut oil for cooking, hair/skin care, everything. Finding the right one is important to me. This has a very nice taste. It's not bland like refined (which removes the taste for cooking without affecting the flavor), but is mild enough that it can be used with any baking or sautéing without an overpowering added flavor. Can't rave enough. I've added it to my subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: the real Kira Stoyko

customer_reviews.title: Oh yea
customer_reviews.text: You can pretty much do everything with this stuff. I drizzle it on bread before toasting, I use it as fry oil, or as a no-stick oil in a pan. You can also combine it with a sauce to get a thicker consistency, and coat chicken with it. I mean I even put it on my skin, and it's great for that too. ...If you're into weird stuff you can even rub it on your significant other's body to make them sleek and sexy, and I do that too! Not a bad price, when compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this coconut oil. I use as a moisturizer great for face, hair, elbows knees, and heels. My skin looks younger and is super soft. This is something I will continue to order and will not want to run out of. FYI: this does not smell like a coconut tanning oil, it is more of a soft coconut smell that is not over powering.
customer_reviews.author: Budd and Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coconut oil. I've tried many but I especially like this one for my body care needs. It's a make up remover, it's a facial soap that leaves my face feeling like it does when I'm in Hawaii, so moist and has not caused one single breakout. I have had two surgeries this year and I use it on my scars when I rub on my scar tissue and it's very soothing. I use it as a hair mask. If you're thinking of a different brand, give this one a try first!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality-Great taste-great scent!
customer_reviews.text: This oil tastes and smells Great! It has a light coconut scent, not intense. For a moisturizer it's a bit greasy. If you have really dry skin, using it at night or when you're staying home will help. I use a tiny amount just around my eyes at night, it keeps the area lubricated and doesn't irritate my eyes. I keep it in a cupboard, not refridgerated, and it has stayed solid. I have put a small amount in an empty cosmetic container so that I can dip my finger in it when I want to use it as a moisturizer without contaminating the whole jar, because its a great-tasting oil for cooking. This is really good quality oil.
customer_reviews.author: GP AlaskaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Scalp Treatment!
customer_reviews.text: The oil arrived in a liquid state. But it has solidified at room temperature since I received it. There is a coconutty scent, but not overpowering in any way. I have used it once to massage my scalp & hair; kind of like a deep conditioning agent & I have seen significant improvement with my scalp. The dryness, itchiness & flaking (a mix of dandruff & psoriasis) has drastically decreased from one use. I plan to continue this process!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing help for skin cancer
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my grandpa to use as a moisturizer because he has skin cancer. Before using it he was using regular lotions and his arms and legs were so dark purple almost black now the purple is starting to go away I can see patches of his actual skin color and the areas that are still purple are much lighter. He says it has really helped stop the itching which was my main concern as regular lotions have perfumes and chemicals which will dry the skin even more causing the itch to intensify. So as long as this stops him from itching I will give 100 stars.
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: ... this product in March of 2017 and it worked fine at first
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in March of 2017 and it worked fine at first. I use coconut oil frequently, to take off makeup and use as a hair mask but a little goes a long way so even now 8 months later i still have it. I recently started smelling a gross smell come from this oil, i always keep it sealed and in room temperature so nothing got into it. I've never had a product smell this bad and I've used a ton of different coconut oil brands that have lasted me way longer than a year. Not sure what happened here but this is not a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ajla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is the best I have tried. It has a very white color, and a light sweet flavor that I have not found in other brands. I will continue to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This coconut oil stood up better mixed with essential oils better than another brand did. It also doesn't get as soft when it is in the bathroom and the shower is hot. I use this in my extremely dry hair as a conditioner. I apply it on the ends of my hair and rinse out after a few minutes. Works better than any conditioner. I also use this as a body moisturizer and my skin is very happy. I do not like the smell of coconut and this is so mild it is refreshing, but barely able to be smelled.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Smells and works really well!
customer_reviews.text: Smell reminds me of a Hawaiian vacation and the richness of the oil is great. It's solid in the container, but turns liquid at skin temperature. It doesn't leave a greasy film on my skin, either. It looks oily at first, but within minutes it soaks in and my skin just feels soft. I've used it on my hair, left it on a half hour before shampooing, and it makes my hair look a little shinier. I haven't yet used it to eat, and probably won't. But if it tastes as good as it smells, it would probably be delicious.
customer_reviews.author: NJTTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Stuck with defective product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered previously 2x and was fine, just bought for 3rd time and product not creamy white as prior jars, there’s large brown area at bottom of jar and blotchy, crackled appearance, definitely not same quality as before, also “best by” date barely 5 months away, fresh coconut oil should be best by quality for 1-2 years. When Attempting to return this item, Got message stating it’s not returnable, apparently under any circumstances, even when item is defective..Wanted to inform others to avoid wasting their money and to investigate online return policies in general (which may be different at this time)..
customer_reviews.author: Leefair

customer_reviews.title: It's really good.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to brush my teeth. Freshen breath. Reduce acne. I apply it after my self barber. I moisturize my hair. I reduce scars with it. It helps my acne and it even helps you sing longer. Take 1 1/2 teaspoon and you'll see it wets your whistle for those karaoke nights without hurting your throat. Oil is better than water in some instances. It's not moldy on arrival. Pleasant passive coconut smell.
customer_reviews.author: Senyahinc

customer_reviews.title: DISSATISFIED WITH PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Anjou Coconut Oil, Organic Extra Virgin, Cold Pressed Unrefined for Hair, Skin, Cooking, Health, Beauty, USDA Certified, 11 I bought the above item which arrived over the weekend when I was away. When opened package on Monday found that the lid was not properly screwed on and seal inside was broken. In my attempted to return it said no return (I had not that seem before I bought it) and I'm not able to contact seller after numerous tried. Anyone needs this item try finding another seller. Service is bad
customer_reviews.author: Claire Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality organic coconut oil!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best quality extra virgin, cold-pressed organic coconut oil ever! I have used it as a butter substitute, for cooking, on my hair and nails, and in recipes. It smells wonderful and tastes very mild. I highly recommend this and will buy it again. I even made a healthy "candy" of 1 tsp organic blackstrap molasses with 1 tbsp Anjou coconut oil (almost solid mixes best), smashed together and chilled until hard in a small container. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Donna S

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as a liquid but easy to get back to solid
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine yesterday but so far so good. It did arrive completely liquid but it wasn't leaking and I just put it in the fridge for under an hour and it was solid just in time for my shower :) It was still solid this morning as well so I was happy. I'm sure most people know it just depends on the temperature of where it had to travel through and of your home as to whether it stays solid or liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Riea

customer_reviews.title: less moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I use extra virgin coconut oil everyday for my skin as moisturizer, and daily cooking. This is a pretty good oil but after I have used for a month,I found it less moisturizing than the previous brand which I have used for 5 years, because after couple of hours I start feeling dry on my skin, even I put more.So if you use it as cooking,this is the wonderful coconut oil, but if you use it for your skin, then I recommend to find others brand.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Nice product...but a bit grainy
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and packaged great to avoid any damage. I had not used this brand of coconut oil before. I've used quite a bit of it and it is a high quality product. It's a bit grainier than another oil I've used, which is why it did not get the full five stars, but I would recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Almost about to expire bottle delivered 😡
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this oil to massage my 11 months old son, this is my 3rd bottle. I never had any complains before but I am really very upset this time because they sent me a bottle that will expire in August 2020, it was delivered to me yesterday and when I tried to return it, it says the item is not eligible to return. There is no way i can finish even half of it my august, the previous bottle I had has an expiry date of 2021. They just wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Anisha

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product. It's the second brand that I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product. It's the second brand that I have tried. I use it for my hair and body. For my body it's perfect. I've completely ditched buying lotion for the time being. I don't feel oily after I apply it and it makes my skin super soft. For my hair, I don't really care too much for it. I feel like it doesn't keep my hair super moisturized like the other brand of coconut oil I used did. However, that could also be because I now live in a different climate. I would buy again...just not for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great smell
customer_reviews.text: Goes a long way. I’ve been using this for DIY projects for over two months, and I still haven’t ran out! Also, it smells like coconut oil. I see reviews for other products that say it doesn’t have the smell- this one definitely does. Very excellent product, when I run out, I will be purchasing more of this.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: In love with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my dogs due to a suggestion from my vet. One of the dogs had a chronic dry skin issue. Within days of feeding him a teaspoon a day and rubbing him down with the oil...his coat is growing back in shiny and healthier than it has ever been...All 7 dogs love their dose and look amazing..I have also used it on my hair and skin which also look better than ever...I definitely will be buying more of this product
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful coconut scent lasts all day on skin!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mild coconut scent that lasts all day on skin. Perfect for hydrating skin without being too oily. Absorbs great. Better than other moisturizers. Perfect for tanning without all those chemicals. I use it when working outside. Nice bronzing without sunburn. So good. Ordered first jar back in November. Price has decreased by $2.00 so I’ll be ordering TWO this time!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this product for the first time and I absolutely love the smell and taste of it. I have been putting it in my smoothies and I like that it blends in nicely and doesn’t separate like other coconut oils that I’ve tried before. I’ve also been sautéing my chicken and veggies with it and it gives an amazing coconut flavor. I intend to purchase another bottle when this one ends.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: The best Organic Coconut Oil I have tried!! 5 Stars.....
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! THIS IS SOME OF THE BEST COCONUT OIL BY ANJOU!! I use it on my hair, skin, and to cook with. I also take a spoonful everyday. Sometimes I use it for oil pulling. The tatse and smell is so Awesome! It smell like something tropical. I give this company five stars. It comes package very well sealed and the shipping is fast. I would definitely buy this again!! I recommend Anjou Organic Coconut Oil to all. Thank You, Anjou!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula lee

customer_reviews.title: Came in as a liquid, great hair moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Used the coconut oil in my hair before bleaching it. It worked great, my hair still lightened, and my hair was moisturized throughout the process I even dyed it the same day. I left it in my hair for 2 1/2 hours before putting bleach in my hair. I did not rinse it out before I put the bleach in.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful aroma, huge container for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that the jar is properly sealed so the package didn't arrive leaking everywhere. THE AROMA!!!! Oh my goodness! I bought this to cook with, but I also poured a separate jar to use as mouthwash, and my huz enjoys the smell so much that he rubs it onto his beard as a pick-me-up. Lol. Have no complaints, and the jar is huge for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Organic coconut oil with a mild pleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: Has a slight coconut scent, very pleasant. I purchased this to use in cooking but I first used it in a recipe for my dogs, anti-flea treats. One part brewer's yeast to 2 parts coconut oil is supposed to discourage fleas from biting your dog plus the coconut oil enhances the dog's coat. My dogs love the treats and time will tell how it affects their coats. I look forward to updating this review as I use the coconut oil in cooking meals.
customer_reviews.author: GMakTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Cap
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with a cracked cap, which means that the coconut oil was exposed to the air. Since it's a third-party, it's not eligible for a return, which is super disappointing. It feels like there should be better product inspection going on before shipping items like this out, since the damage was pretty noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nichols

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Great quality I have tried a lot of coconut oils for hair and skin moisturizer for both me and our pups. This is by far the easiest to use it is solid but soft enough to scoop out unlike some others I’ve tried and it melts nicely and completely in your hands. Works great for hair and skin and has tons of other uses as well.
customer_reviews.author: MrsN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent consistency!!
customer_reviews.text: A superior coconut oil! I have been using quality coconut oil for 6 years now and was in a pinch and needed an oil like tomorrow!! So went to my trusty Amazon Prime and took a chance on another brand. I am extremely pleased with the quality and consistency of this c/o. I would have rated 5 stars if it were in a glass jar!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S

customer_reviews.title: but now I smell like a beach vacation
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a hair mask, an in-shower body moisturizer, and a tiny bit on my face for moisture as well. Not only did this moisturize well, but now I smell like a beach vacation. The only drawback is that this smells so good I was getting hungry while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Changed consistency very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I loved the scent. It was not heavy as other users found it to be. I love the original consistency but it got hard and then lumpy shortly after opening. To be clear i use it as a body moisturizer in the shower. I do not want to have to take the tub in and out and am not sure that would have helped on any case. i would not likely buy it again because of the change in consistency.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieF

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal I've Found!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this brand several times.. use it for baking and body/face products and it's awesome for hair.. burns, infections too! I used to buy a more expensive known brand but the quality of this one has me hooked. Only thing I wish would be a version with coconut flavor..this one doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Keyanna Otholt

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product... I’m almost done with my first jar and my skin is flawless. I use it as a whole body moisturizer, every time I get out the shower. It smells good and feels good on my skin. I also apply it to my face once a week,leave on for a couple of hours, then wash my face as normal. I like that you don’t need to apply a lot and it’s not too greasy. I will definitely be ordering again, and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: Like the oil but not the packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I like the coconut oil although the plastic jar is topped with an aluminum covering pressed directly on top of the first layer of the oil before the plastic cover. I cut off the first layer of the oil so there is no aluminum residue but definitely would recommend that a glass jar is used with no aluminum for the packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & Wonderful Coconut Oil!
customer_reviews.text: I love using coconut oil for just about everything (as a hair mask, makeup remover, cooking, in smoothies, as a moisturizer, etc). I still have so much coconut oil as a little bit goes a long way. Virgin, Cold Pressed and Unrefined Coconut Oil is what you want as it is in the most "pure" coconut form which is what this product is. I believe this is my third time purchasing this brand as well! No complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: TristinTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I had a hard time trying to find a good coconut oil and I am happy to say I finally did with this one. I absolutely love this stuff. I use it in the shower. While my body is still wet I rub it in my skin. It goes on smooth when it is in solid form and it also has a silky feel when it becomes a liquid. I will definitely be purchasing this again when I run out. I know you can cook with it but I like it more for the body. Makes me feel very soft. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like this oil
customer_reviews.text: We only use unrefined, organic coconut oil as a supplement, and this seems to be a good one. Nice smell and texture.
customer_reviews.author: floret 15

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th purchase on coconut oil. So far this one is the best by far. My grandaughter has severe eczema that lands her in the hospital. She made 8th worst case in the US. I thought let me try this for her, has good reviews. Her skin responded so well with this coconit oil as a moisturizer. Goad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Merylin Weidenhof

customer_reviews.title: If you put it in a cool environment it will return to a solid state
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 3 times already. I use it for my hair and skin. I tried to purchase this item before the summer temperatures because it will melt. If you put it in a cool environment it will return to a solid state.
customer_reviews.author: Lardell Family

customer_reviews.title: wouldnt get again
customer_reviews.text: bought this to make whipped shea body butter and it was a little grainy. It was my first time making it and I have done it again since and used a different coconut oil and I wouldn't get this brand again. my lotions came out much smoother and more whipped with a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great all the way around
customer_reviews.text: Organic cocnut oil it great for a many of things. Thank you unfortunatly in todays day cost always has to be a factor eating heathly and taking natural vitamins are not money friendly. You seem to care and your price was wonderful! Thank you for keeping prices fair.
customer_reviews.author: Lambchop60

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am currently going through chemotherapy and had lost my hair. My scalp was sore and itchy and the bit of fuzz I had left rough and dry. My hairdresser recommended coconut oil and I chose this product. I daily put it on my scalp and massage in. It liquefied immediately and has releaved the itching and redness and softened my fuzz. I also use it on my face nightly and it softens without clogging pores and leaves my face very smooth. I am very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Houston homey

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: I tried several brands and so far these one from India and Sri Lanka are the best ones. Smells good and works perfect for skin hair and food
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: My final choice after a hunt.
customer_reviews.text: I am a "regular" with this product. challenge yourself to do what I did, and you will end up right here.... Look online for the best priced premium product. Save you the time, here it is.
customer_reviews.author: sacredwriter

customer_reviews.title: Used post waxing.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've mostly used this to remove residue and sooth skin post waxing. Has worked well. My dog also loves it in his food. It's really warm here and it's summer time so it has stayed in liquid form in my home. Might refrigerate.
customer_reviews.author: LilyTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Love it!,
customer_reviews.text: Great for your hair and skin. Leaves my hair soft & smooth without a heavy..greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Oneill

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Product! It arrived on time, was well packaged, and the oil itself seems of wonderful quality. Unfortunately, I had an allergic reaction, and can no longer eat or use any coconut products, which is a shame because this is a great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Cori Lovings

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully and smells like you're sticking your nose into a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully and smells like you're sticking your nose into a coconut! Just make sure to wash it out of your hair and not just leave it in like I did. Makes it look, well, oily. :)
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: The best organic non GMO oil I have found
customer_reviews.text: This is the best organic coconut oil I have found. Since ordering this brand the first time I have not ordered any other brand. It smells great and works very well with the products I make with it. It’s very reasonable in price and I would recommend this brand to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Sharyl Hollingshead

customer_reviews.title: Great for mild/moderate eczema
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My daughter has eczema and we've used the expensive lotions and she would still have bad flare ups. We've been using this oil for almost a month and we still have at least 3/4 container left. It has helped with her eczema more than store bought, expensive, doctor recommended lotions. Very affordable. Will continue to purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: E.D.

customer_reviews.title: Anjou Organic Cocunut Oil
customer_reviews.text: Great scent, flavor, and moisure!!! I use it for my hair, usually mix with other essential oils... it was perfect. I also use to moisturize rough skin patches.... it is great!!! I used it to cook too and it was perfect in taste. This has a great coconut taste, unlike other coconut oils I've bought. Good size for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell n taste
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor of this oil, only people that like coconut oil as much i do will love the smell of natura scent, im happy i found this product is amazing ! I used mine for so many different things n it feels safe!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia alvarenga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for medical needs
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make a cannabis infused pain cream. It's sent is lovely and worked amazing in my pain cream. I wanted something that would have a high enough smoke temp to be able to cook the infusion and I love that it absorbed into the skin easily to get the full effects of the medicine 💚
customer_reviews.author: Sedona

customer_reviews.title: Great product my wife
customer_reviews.text: Great product my wife, my baby and i use this every night before we go to sleep in our faces and it helps a lot with the heat if your house gets a little dry but also its great for your skin!!! 100% Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck by far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog to help with dry skin and itching. Adding just a teaspoon to his food made a noticeable difference, and it's also plenty good for use in the kitchen for us humans as well! For the cost of this huge container you can't do any better than this. Top quality, top quantity, bottom line price.
customer_reviews.author: R Cave

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-use product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this July 2018 and I still have half left and it's great. Wonderful to shave with. I also apply it to small minor burns and it almost instantly stops the pain. Mix a small amount with sea salt or coarse grain sugar and you have an inexpensive but all-natural body scrub leaving your skin soft and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie K

customer_reviews.title: Suspicious product...
customer_reviews.text: This product smells like frosted flakes and not as good as other coconut oils I've purchased. I'm suspicious that this might be a bad product or an imitation. I will not be repurchasing in the future. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my dogs, a couple of whom have itching issues. The dogs love it and it is helping their coats and the itches. I am hoping for one summer free of hot spots! And it’s great on my hands!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisD

customer_reviews.title: This jar of coconut oil is the bomb Diggity and yes  it makes my skin feels so soft and refreshing🎀
customer_reviews.text: Receive my coconut oil today, was very pleased with it, it was just what I wanted⛄⛄
customer_reviews.author: Rose Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not good coco oil.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not 100% coconut oil. I use it on my body after I shower and I am definitely not allergic to coconuts but something in this has made me break out into a rash every time I try to put it on. I think it’s mixed with an additive and not disclosed. Wish I could return the product but it is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Coconut Bliss!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product! I am pleased with this coconut oil. It has so many uses......and is wonderful on the skin! The scent is light and isn't detected a few minutes after use on the skin. The oil is rapidly absorbed and eases dry skin quickly. It is a multi use product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail M. Podaridis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute BEST! This is by far one of the best coconut oils I have used. I make great body butter with this as 1 of the key ingredients or use by itself as a morning & night time moisturizer for face and body. It smells so amazing, everybody compliments me on how my skin looks, feels, and smells. I would literally give it 10 stars if I could..will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Mandie Davidson

customer_reviews.title: They need to cycle through their stock...
customer_reviews.text: Well I've bought and loved this brand before but this purchase has an expiry date of this August... No way I can finish all this before then and I'll have to keep an eye out for spoiling.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Yellowing but smells right?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not angry, and it's not the best by date yet but it's beginning to yellow on the bottom and I'm not sure what to do about that... Might contact the seller and try to replace it or get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: catblob

customer_reviews.title: I love this coconut oil!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it I will be reordering. It at first was liquid and that bothered me, but the next morning when I awoke it was solid as it should be. Will reorder!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time, and seller reached out to make sure everything was ok and to inform me on the product and how to store it and the form it’ll take in different temperatures. Very professional seller and great product . I use it for cooking as well as for my skin. Great price for such a big jar
customer_reviews.author: MzD

customer_reviews.title: Not good on hair
customer_reviews.text: This review is NOT about cooking. So I’ve heard of plenty of ppl saying they melt this down to use as oil for the hair. Well it did nothing but dry it out and made my hair itch like crazy! Would not use again but I did find other cooking oils are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Da Choyce

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This sits next to my bed and I use it as a moisturizer. I love it. It instantly turns to a liquid as it hits your body. It has a nice light coconut scent that dissapates quickly. It rubs in quickly too unless you apply a lot at one time. I have looked for years and tried a lot of products to find the best moisturizers and this is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Coconut Oil, it makes my skin feel so good especially since I've recently began to suffer from extremely dry skin on my legs! I don't use normal lotions anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Turner

customer_reviews.title: Broken container and useless hardened coconut oil.
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible experience. The coconut oil was shipped poorly. I received the item and most of the container was empty with hardened coconut oil left over. The lid was cracked and oddly there wasn’t any coconut oil residue in the box the item was shipped in. I also received dial soap on the same container which I didn’t order. I see this item isn’t returnable. All I want is a refund since I can’t even use the product, it’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Anjou Coconut Oil, Organic Extra Virgin, Cold Pressed Unrefined for Hair, Skin, Cooking, Health, Beauty, USDA Certified, 11oz
feature_bullets: 100% organic & natural: USDA certified, cold pressed coconut oil from non-GMO coconuts, free of bleach, hexane, and trans fat.
Diet-friendly: Enjoy the exceptional health and nutritional benefits of MCT (medium-chain triglycerides); the perfect non-fattening diet recipe for everyday cooking.
Source of beauty: Use it for deep-level hair care and skin nourishment as a moisturizer, also acts as a gentle makeup remover.
Cook with style: A healthier, tastier, and dairy-free alternative to butter and other vegetable oils, also a better replacement for cooking oil, salad dressing, and butter.
Mix & match: Blend with Anjou Essential Oils or other carrier oils for the most relaxing massages, can also be used in aromatherapy recipes.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
